message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm keeping most of it!
I'll take 40, you can have 60, a more balanced split!
I'm being generous, but I'm still the one making the offer!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
Last chance, I'm taking 60, you can have 40!
You're getting close to giving up, I'm not!
My last stand, I'm taking 80, you can have 20!
You're almost out of chances, I'm taking control!
